abstract: Fire in chemistry classroom seriously burns five students at W T Woodson High School in Fairfax County, Virginia.
lead_paragraph: Two students were flown by helicopter to a burn center in Washington with life-threatening injuries, and three others were flown to the main trauma center in Fairfax County.

headline.main: 5 Students Seriously Injured in Fire in Virginia Chemistry Classroom
headline.print_headline: 5 Students Seriously Hurt in School Fire

snippet: Two students were flown by helicopter to a burn center in Washington with life-threatening injuries, and three others were flown to the main trauma center in Fairfax County.
